>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

@Icon[type:graviton] Graviton Revelation

Gravitational anomalies ripple through your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zM7oc1qiNLAPoH1J]{Solar Armor}, providing unexpected protection against devastating hits. As long as your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zM7oc1qiNLAPoH1J]{Solar Armor} is active, you gain a 20% chance that a critical hit against you is treated as a normal attack, dealing normal damage and not applying any critical effect. You roll this percentage chance before the critical hit damage is rolled. You must have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zM7oc1qiNLAPoH1J]{Solar Armor} to select this revelation.

When you are attuned or fully attuned, the chance that a critical hit against you is treated as a normal attack increases to 40%.
